trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Manchester
There were no other sightings in Manchester on or around November 25th 2009
Summary: two brightly lit craft, one possibly a Cessna, flying together and only a few yards apart
divs: sighting detailsat approximately 5:30pm (est) while driving home from work i watched two brightly lit craft flying over the washtenaw\jackson county line in a northwesterly direction. i work in tecumseh, mi (lenawee county) and was driving home by way of manchester and napoleon, michigan. while driving west on austin road near the county line i watched two brightly lit craft flying slowly together toward the northwest. initially i thought that they may have been military helicopters or jets as these two craft seemed to be flying in extremely tight formation, one leading and one slightly behind. i soon realized that they were flying much too slow to be military. they were both lit brightly and i then realized that they were flying together, dangerously close to one another. the sky was a dark shade of blue as the sun had set about twenty minutes previous to the sighting. i could make out that the trailing object was probably a cessna-type craft. i could just barely see the dark shape of the wings, fusalge with wingtip lights in their appropriate configuration. however, the craft immediately ahead of it was unidentifiable. it had a rather large red strobing light and a steady white light. the strobing red light was much larger than what i've seen on other aircraft, perhaps three or four times as big. it also seemed to be at the rear of the object. what is most disturbing about this are that the two craft were much too close to one another for safe flying...the distance between the two was less than a hundred feet (using the size of the trailing cessna-type craft as a reference). they maintained their distance and didn't seem to deviate, as if connected together. the bright red strobe and two bright white lights remained visible on the horizon to the nw (flying toward jackson, mi) for several minutes after passing above and ahead of me. it was difficult to make out any more details due to the traffic with headlights in the oncoming lane. what still bothers me today is that these two objects were insanely close together and didn't deviate position during their flight while in my observation. i've never seen anything like this before (including aircraft pulling gliders). this might not be a ufo event but it certainly was an unusual display of two craft flying dangerously close to one another (and possibly illegally so).
